td.content: s:patient presents with Heart. he is having symptoms 16 x week, in spite of treatment. patient is a 33 yr old male statistician. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life occasional EtOH o:Height 187 cm, Weight 83.5 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Embolic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ACTIVASE - 50 mg IV, and ordered MRI Brain.

s:a 34 yo white male complains of mild flatulence and mild diarrhea. NKDA. o:Height 188 cm, Weight 84.2 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation, HEENT: WNL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered Urea breath test.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

td.content: s:a 34 YO male with Heart. he has had several such episodes over past 4 months. o:Height 188 cm, Weight 85.2 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Embolic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:a male statistician aged 34 yrs presents w/ c/o 12 days h/o Heart. o:Height 188 cm, Weight 85.7 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Embolic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered MRI Brain.

s:a 35 year old m statistician presents with 7 days history of moderate epigastric pain and moderate heartburn. o:Height 187 cm, Weight 83.8 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = tender epigastric region, no distension a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

s:a white male aged 35 ys presents with moderate heartburn for more than 2 days. he does not smoke he drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 187 cm, Weight 83.5 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = tender epigastric region, no distension a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed pantoprazole - 40 mg daily, and ordered Endoscopic therapy - gastroesophageal junction.
